page.title: 18MY DAD- A POLICEMAN
page.content: THERE IS QUITE FOR A POLICEMAN TO DO IN SHEPTON MALLET.MY DAD HAS TO SUPERVISE MAJOR EVENT'S SUCH AS THE { {MID-SOMERSET SHOW}AND THE{CARNIVAL. VANDALISM BY CHILDREN TAKES UP A LOT OF MY DAD'S TIME,AS WELL AS THEFT ,DAMAGE TO PROPERTY AND TRAFFIC OFFENCES. THERE ARE 2 SERGEANTS AND 14 POLICEMEN BASED IN SHEPTON MALLET.THERE IS ALSO A TRAFFIC WARDEN.4 OF THE POLICE CONSTABLES COVER THE RURAL AREAS AROUND SHEPTON.WHEN THESE POLICEMEN ARE OF DUTY THEY ARE COVERED BY POLICEMEN FROM SHEPTON. ANOTHER 4 POLICEMEN ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE 4{BEATS}THAT SHEPTON IS DIVIDED INTO.THE REST ARE CAR DRIVERS.
